title: Ferne McCann says Jordan Hames was a 'one night thing' and she wants 'someone kind'
text:

Ferne McCann has insisted it was 'just a one night thing' after she was spotted locking lips with Love Island 2019 hunk Jordan Hames at a cocktail party last month.

The former TOWIE star has been single since splitting with Arthur Collins in 2017, when she was pregnant with daughter Sunday.

After Collins was sent to prison for 20 years for his part in an acid attack at a London nightclub, Ferne was left to raise Sunday alone.

This month the mum made the most of a rare night out in Mayfair by snogging Jordan in front of stunned onlookers.

(Image: Phil Lewis/SOPA Images/REX)

(Image: Phil Lewis/SOPA Images/REX)

Days later they both attended the Mirror's Animal Hero Awards - and Ferne has now revealed they enjoyed a third date in private shortly after.

But despite their meet-ups, Ferne admits romance quickly fizzled out.

"It was a one-off, one-night thing - it was very casual," she tells Closer magazine.

(Image: PA)

"He's not 'my one', and I don't think I'm his. We're at two completely different stages at our lives."

While Jordan has been playing the field since leaving the ITV2 dating show, Ferne admits she's looking to get married and have more children soon.

"I want someone that makes me laugh, but who's got himself together. Someone who's kind and who I just click with and can just be myself with. There's a lot on my list!" she says.

(Image: fernemccann/Instagram)

For now, Ferne is content being a mum to daughter Sunday, who she says is becoming more like her every day.

"It makes me more proud because I've had to do this all on my own," she says.

Ferne McCann: First Time Mum returns Wednesday 30 October 9pm on ITVBe
description: Former TOWIE star Ferne McCann has lifted the lid on her brief romance with Love Island star Jordan Hames
